website_summaries.verdict: Those looking for a unique take on the sit up pillow will find their match in this medically-savvy, multi-function product.
pros: Versatile sit up pillow can also be used for sleep and leg elevation
Topped with memory foam for comfortable support
Large design provides ample coverage to upper body and head
Improves posture, orthopedic health, and breathing
cons: Some owners wished the product was shorter
Firmer than a few buyers desired

customer_reviews.title: Her doctor recommended a bed wedge and I purchased this pillow after ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 98 yr old mother who was just diagnosed with congestive heart failure. Her doctor recommended a bed wedge and I purchased this pillow after reviewing many. My mother does not hesitate to say if she likes or dislikes anything and she is very happy with this pillow. She can side sleep as well and actually uses this wedge with her own pillow. She says it is very comfortable and I like the fact it has a removable washable cover. I hope I can someday find a second cover.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne W

customer_reviews.title: We purchased this pillow and his sleeping is much more comfortable, his breathing is better and all around
customer_reviews.text: My husband has esophageal cancer and was told he needed to sleep at a 45 degree angle. We purchased this pillow and his sleeping is much more comfortable, his breathing is better and all around, he hasn't had a bad night's sleep since using this pillow. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lillieflo

customer_reviews.title: Good product except for depression in middle
customer_reviews.text: The wedge functions as described and meets my needs as long as it is supplemented with a pillow. My only complaint is somewhat cosmetic and why I only gave it four stars. Apparently to minimize bulk for shipping, the wedge had been tightly folded over and shrink wrapped prior to being placed in a box. After being unwrapped, it expanded ok after a couple of hours with the exception of a dinner-plate sized depression in the middle (see photos). This persists even after several weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: Well, what to say about it. It does a good job for raising me to 45 degree angle. Good for heartburn and post eye surgery. But, is there a really good reason for it to be nearly as hard as a rock!? A softer topper would be a nice improvement. I have to say that it took 2 full weeks before I woke up without a backache. A little hard to get used to so I didn't sleep too well the first week. Now, however, it's fine. Yes, I'd recommend it but don't throw away your pillow. It helps!
customer_reviews.author: Polly B

customer_reviews.title: I was recommended to buy one of these pillow
customer_reviews.text: Had shoulder surgery and of course you can't sleep flat. I was recommended to buy one of these pillow. I use it to sleep on the couch works great. Helps to sleep well while I heal. I only wish it had a white cover as a pillow case,.
customer_reviews.author: nathan l

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful sleep aid.
customer_reviews.text: The bed wedge is very good for me in me sleep routine. It keeps my head at an angle that reduces my problem with sinus drainage and acid reflux while I sleep. I do place caution to those that are sensitive to having heat on your head. The pillow tends to hold the heat, for a lack of a better phrase, from your head which can become uncomfortable to some, but I see this as a personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: J'aime Dingle

customer_reviews.title: Warning!
customer_reviews.text: I took off the cover and discovered lots of hair which are not mine. The cushion was not in the perfect condition, either. Discolored and some chips. I strongly suggest you to remove a cover and make sure if yours is brand new when you receive it.
customer_reviews.author: Bossa Nova Lover

customer_reviews.title: The wedge was put under her mattress which elevates her to a good height.
customer_reviews.text: The wedge was ordered for my elderly mother who has dementia and was recently sick with a respiratory infection. I was told to keep her elevated while in bed. I tried regular pillows but she wouldn't use two at a time and would fall off of even her regular pillow. The wedge was put under her mattress which elevates her to a good height.
customer_reviews.author: Laverna Keim

customer_reviews.title: Soft and very functional
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this pillow for a back rest for sitting against a wall. Our convertible couch folds down flat like a futon couch, and before buying this pillow I struggled to find a comfortable way to sit against our wall. This wedge pillow has worked nicely by putting it vertically against the wall in combination with various pillows. Laying flat is feels nice, but I still like to add a bed pillow. My wife likes it with out extra pillows. It is quite soft and also supportive. It's expensive but it is certainly high quality and has met my expectations. If you can stomach the price, I think you'll like this wedge pillow.
customer_reviews.author: rgn

customer_reviews.title: I love It
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow. I was "forced" to deduct a star because there isn't an option to purchase extra cases. I had shoulder replacement surgery one week ago, but have been using the pillow since early December in order to get used to it. It took no time at all & I found that I was sleeping better than ever. I've been home from the hospital for 4 days. I was concerned because the hospital bed was adjustable. I needn't have worried - the wedge is the perfect height. I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Kris72663

customer_reviews.title: Best wedge pillow ever
customer_reviews.text: I needed a pillow that would allow me to sleep on my back, not my favorite position. This is a big wedge with slant that enables one to rest very comfortably. I placed it against my headboard and layered a very soft small pillow on the wide end. Had best sleep ever post surgery. Just ordered another one for my husband. If you have sleep apnea, need to elevate your head, this wedge will work
customer_reviews.author: Churchill

customer_reviews.title: Able to sleep in a bed after shoulder surgery!
customer_reviews.text: Invaluable if you have shoulder surgery! Won’t be able to sleep in a bed without it! Used for many weeks after rotator cuff surgery.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M. Greco

customer_reviews.title: Thrilled with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this before my double mastectomy surgery, when I knew I would not be able to use my arms to sit up in bed. It is wonderful!! Perfect amount of firmness, support and comfort! Makes for the perfect night's rest. And once I'm recovered, this will be ideal for watching tv in bed or sleeping elevated when sick with a cold. I am thrilled with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and the angle is good enough that it does ...
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and the angle is good enough that it does the job of keeping my head and chest elevated but no so much that it's too hard to get comfortable or fall asleep. I'm a side sleeper and this is soft enough that I am able to roll over and sleep on my side. It's not as comfortable as doing it while laying flat and it's probably not good for the back, but the wedge is soft & cushiony enough that it's possible.
customer_reviews.author: Striving for Fair & Balanced

customer_reviews.title: Don't Trust Labels
customer_reviews.text: Neither the name "Cushy Form" nor "Pillow" accurately describes this product's feel. It is so hard I had to discard it during the night.
customer_reviews.author: Value Seeker

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Love this wedge. I can use this pillow sleeping on my side or my back. It is comfy without being too soft or too firm. I am a big gal and this does not compress too low. I've only used for 1 week so I'll try to update my review after a month regarding shape.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's very comfortable and of good material
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pillow I've bought in this wedge shape. I just bought an iPad and wanted a pillow that would elevate my head so I could watch videos on it. It's very comfortable and of good material. Would have liked options to buy pillow cases but understand that is not what the company is in business for. I bought one for my mom because I had to elevate her bed in the past because she has acid reflux. She loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: David Maquilon

customer_reviews.title: High quality product!!
customer_reviews.text: Top quality foam and beautiful thick covering make this bed wedge an ultimate product. So much nicer than others I have purchased over the years!! Far nicer than any I have found in local stores. Very happy with my purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: BDL

customer_reviews.title: Hard as a rock
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this. I thought it would help me transition back into my own bed after rotator cuff surgery. I was tired of sleeping in the recliner every night. However, it was just way too hard to be comfortable on. I ended up being a lot more comfortable making a mound of pillows and blankets and sleeping on that instead. This was a big fail for me.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: 5 plus stars!
customer_reviews.text: I can't lay flat due to health issues, but I needed a bone density test that required me to do so. I called the radiology department ahead of time, asking about using a foam wedge, and the technician said it "might or might not" work. If it didn't interfere with the picture I could use one. It didn't and I did use it successfully, scooting down just a skosh. I was grateful to have it with me. The excellent reviews here helped me choose this one. The delivery time was fast, the wedge was beautifully packaged and it didn't smell at all. This will be handy for future appointments and around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Yippee! It works. Comfy. Elevated sleeping takes getting used to...but my snoring and coughing is greatly reduced.
customer_reviews.author: Mark P. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Stopped my snoring! Used to be a CPAP User
customer_reviews.text: Got burnt out on using my CPAP. A friend suggested using a wedge to sleep on as it would reduce my snoring. It did! However, it does take some time getting used to sleeping on an incline. I use one pillow to bolster my head and neck at the top of the bolstered wedge. Comfortable memory foam. Remember, you can't return. But I tried a couple and this one was the best. It took about a week to adjust to using the Wedge Pillow so hang in there! :-) You wont be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Harry S.

customer_reviews.title: Holds it shape even after several months.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a wedge to sleep on due to shoulder surgery. I have slept on it every night for the last 2 months and it is working great. I was worried the foam would sag in after a while but it has not...still firm as ever. I also use it to lean against to read during the day and it is very comfortable. Would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Carey Allen

customer_reviews.title: Too Big!
customer_reviews.text: This would be a great pillow wedge if it wasn't so big. Tried to use this for my husband who is in bed most of the time because of illness but the Wedge is way too big for him to get into bed and lay back on. So surprised. It is very comfortable but too big!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Pinnick

customer_reviews.title: Sleep at last
customer_reviews.text: I have experienced a lot of back problems over the last few years that have made sleeping a troublesome activity. This little foam wedge has made a big difference. I have only been using it 3 nights and the difference is amazing. It's definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Christiansen

customer_reviews.title: Great for shoulder surgery recovery!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this wedge pillow for rotator cuff surgery recovery. It is perfect! I am much more comfortable on this than the recliner. It soft but supportive. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Salisbury

customer_reviews.title: No way you can sleep on this
customer_reviews.text: Angle is too high for sleeping or for watching tv in bed. I gave it to my son and he props it against the couch for back support when he plays plays video games. As I recall, it was a fairly expensive pillow that was totally useless for its intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Dena

customer_reviews.title: Waste of my money. Can’t use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wedge pillow to help with my sleep apnea and snoring. I was really hopeful after seeing the overall reviews. However, it was way too firm! It was so uncomfortable for me that I can’t use it at all! Total waste of my money and this one was not cheap at all. I don’t know how any side sleepers could use this.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I needed this elevation for a vertigo condition. It works very well and is extremely comfortable. I was also impressed with the way it came packaged. Very good product. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: southern girl

customer_reviews.title: This was a lifesaver after my sinus surgery, and ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a lifesaver after my sinus surgery, and now my husband wants one. I'm sure I'll continue using this for sleep or just watching TV. I did add a pillow to give my neck more support. You do slide down a bit, but not enough to be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: MichelleL

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pillow! I suffer from nighttime acid reflux, causing ulcers and stricture in my esophagus. I occasionally have trouble breathing and resting comfortably at night. I've used the pillow for a week now, and it has helped me reduce night time acid reflux discomfort and symptoms significantly. I've used similar foam pillows in the past, and had a little trouble adjusting -- particularly having sore neck and back issues. That has not been the case with the memory foam. It's a life saver. :)
customer_reviews.author: Ame Olvey

customer_reviews.title: Has helped with easing my shoulder and neck pain.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable for sleep. This has really helped my husbands neck and shoulder pain. He used to use 3 pillows to sleep as he hated sleeping flat as he couldn’t breathe. The wedge has helped so much he’s almost pain free.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe Fry

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase, helps with digestive discomfort
customer_reviews.text: Really helps with my evening stomach discomfort! I used to wake up frequently with heartburn and indigestion. I added my own pillows on top for extra height and now I can fall asleep easily and stay asleep. The cushion has the right amount of firmness. I also love that the cover is removable for washing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You could spend $$$ for an adjustable bed  frame or you get could get this pillow.
customer_reviews.text: You could spend $$$ for an adjustable bed frame or you get could get this pillow. This pillow will allow you to use it for back support while sitting on the bed to read books, or watch TV. Back pains are eliminated and provides excellent support for your shoulders and neck. It arrives compressed in a box, follow the instructions and allow it to expand to its full dimensions. There are no bad odors at all. I am very happy with quality and functionality.
customer_reviews.author: ACustomer

customer_reviews.title: I really like this pillow for back support
customer_reviews.text: I really like this pillow for back support. It helps with my back, but it doesn't support my neck, so when I sleep on it, I wake up with my back feeling great, but neck usd hurting! Also wake up through the night, trying to find comfortable position for neck, just doesn't work, but this pillow is great for watching television/eating/sitting up with support in bed.....
customer_reviews.author: Shunte

customer_reviews.title: Great support but a little larger than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a timely manner and it does help me sleep. This is my fault but I didn't pay attention to the dimensions so it is a little larger/longer than I expected so to have my head up I have half of my body on it. But again, had I looked at the dimensions I would have anticipated this. It works great and I like the flat back so that I can stand it up out of the way when not in use. It is very comfy and supportive.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Coulson

customer_reviews.title: Firm yet soft, nice and wide, a little too tall (for me)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my GERD symptoms and I think it did help keep acid from coming back up my throat. I am most comfortable sleeping on my side and stomach, and I found I could only use it for a few days and then I needed to use a couple of regular pillows for comfort. Then i go back to using it again after a couple nights on the regular pillows. I think perhaps I should have gone with the wedge pillow that wasn't so tall. It is nice and wide enough for a my size (large female). I like the texture (it's firm yet soft). Probably is perfectly used for back sleepers.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife, who suffers from pain from a previous spinal fusion surgery. She loves this! She says she wakes up with less pain, more refreshed, and it keeps her in a better sleep position for her needs. I, as a side sleeper, wouldn't sleep with this, but it would be great for reading or watching TV in bed. The pillow seems robust, as memory foam usually is, but it doesn't seem to trap heat in the way that it sometimes can. Overall, really great product for those of us who can't afford independently adjustable beds.
customer_reviews.author: derrick

customer_reviews.title: Quick recovery after unpacking
customer_reviews.text: Update: after sleeping on this for several months, I am still giving it five stars. Would give more if possible. I no longer wake up with headaches, I know I breathe better being propped up, pretty much eliminated my snoring. Also, weirdly enough, the hip pain I used to sometimes wake up with is gone as well. Love this and wish I would have gotten one sooner. Will update after I sleep on it, but I have to say I was pleasantly surprised by how quickly it reshaped after taking it out of the protective plastic. Also it came with a little air freshener thing that smells amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jill M

customer_reviews.title: Significantly helped GERD
customer_reviews.text: I wake up with "acid mouth" every morning. After sleeping elevated I haven't felt better. I stand the pillow up to watch TV which keeping better posture has been good for my back too. It is firm at first but has seemed to soften up a bit and is very comfortable now.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Taylor

customer_reviews.title: It's comfortable but need small pillow for head
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it for one night I slept well but think just a little high but have to get the wedge broke in but seems like it's going to be what I wanted for my shoulder I was having to sleep in a recliner for part of the night but stayed in bed all night with the wedge it's
customer_reviews.author: apache

customer_reviews.title: Keeps a firm wedge shape
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality wedge pillow. I use it, plus a 7 inch wedge pillow on my couch to prop me up nicely when I read or watch TV in my bedroom. I also sleep on that couch set-up when I feel like I have acid reflux, and then return to my bed later, which has been raised 4 inches for a slight decline to also help with digestion.
customer_reviews.author: Paul B.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic customer support!
customer_reviews.text: We were expecting "cushy memory foam" and were surprised by how very, very firm this wedge pillow actually was. If very firm support is what you're looking for, this is it; however, it was much more rigid than what we were shopping for. That being said, this company was over the top easy to work with! Will definitely check out their other product lines just because they were so helpful!
customer_reviews.author: mis

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!!!
customer_reviews.text: After rotator cuff surgery, I spent two weeks in a recliner, not able to sleep. Ordered the wedge based on reviews, and the first night, I slept like a baby back in my bed!!! Highly recommended by me, the princess and the pea!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: jerseyred

customer_reviews.title: Stopped snoring, but only because I was waking up every hour or two.
customer_reviews.text: I found the support quite nice when I initially laid down on it, however after sleeping with it for 5 days I've noticed throughout the night I always slide down so I find myself waking up several times a night with my neck cricked somewhat painfully and my feet dangling off the bed (it's so large than when you slide down it it takes up about 1/3 - 1/4 of the bed length). The actual firmness and feel of the pillow is great, but I think the slope is too much for me. Would return it if I had any means to. It's vacuum packed/sealed so virtually impossible for me to return in its original packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Lau

customer_reviews.title: Still carries a distinct odor --well beyond the 2 hour period described in accompanying literature.
customer_reviews.text: The product looks fine, although a special pillow case in addition to the provided cover is needed. The literature included indicates that the pillow has an odor and should be aired out before using. Two hours is the guideline. Mine has been out of the box and on my porch for nearly twenty hours and still smells as strong as it did when I opened the package. I won't sleep on it until is odor free--and if that doesn't happen soon, I will return the pillow. I also wish it came with a separate pillow case. It was not an inexpensive purchase.
customer_reviews.author: paper carrier

customer_reviews.title: Bad idea
customer_reviews.text: Tried it for sleep apnea. Not good idea for someone who rolls on their side in middle of night
customer_reviews.author: Julie D.

customer_reviews.title: Helps that acid stay down so you can sleep.
customer_reviews.text: Helped my GERD immensely and immediately. Good for helping puffiness in eyes as well. Comfy for a side sleeper as long as you use a softer pillow on top otherwise it cranks your neck a bit. But I am extremely happy with the pillow, it's holding its shape after a couple months now. No sagging or anything on this pillow. I think it should last a couple years with proper care. Pillow case is easy to remove and wash. Definitely recommend for GERD sufferers, heartburn or even after a plastic surgery. Good quality with health benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Valo

customer_reviews.title: Decent Product for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived vacuum, and shrink wrapped, so it expanded upon unpacking. I find it very comfortable to recline on for reading, but I can't sleep particularly well on it. Also works nice as a leg rest. I'm recovering from surgery, and experience pain if I remain still for too long. The cover can be removed for washing, which is a nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: Neil OCONNOR

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for Seniors
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this wedge after years of struggling with a mountain of pillows every night. I love it. It is firm overall but soft where it counts--the top couple inches. The shape is very stable; the removable cover is a perfect, snug fit. (I bought a spare cover.) Regular use clearly eases my reflux problem, and I have learned to my delight that it improves sinus drainage overnight--a chronic, lifelong problem in my case. An excellent choice.
customer_reviews.author: James Hall

customer_reviews.title: Resting Well
customer_reviews.text: The bed wedge allows me to control my sinus drainage which causes me to be restless at night. Stacking 2-3 standard pillows did not provide the needed support and comfort. The pillow also provides lower back comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Reverend Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I can't sleep on this pillow, I keep sliding down and end up at the bottom of it. it is very uncomfortable for me.
customer_reviews.author: ed

customer_reviews.title: A restful and pain free night of sleep!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a bed wedge after shoulder surgery for sleep support. The bed wedge foam pillow provided the right level of support in keeping my shoulder elevated. As a result of using it, I was able to sleep comfortably through the night with no pain. To be able to sleep in my bed once again after a month on our recliner was a blessing! The wedge arrived as promised and was high quality! I highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Fran M

customer_reviews.title: We Can Sleep Together Again
customer_reviews.text: My husband says this pillow is comfortable, but I can’t comment on that. What I CAN say is that prior to discovering this pillow, we took turns sleeping on the couch because he is an INCREDIBLY LOUD snorer. Since this purchase, we’ve been able to stay in bed together all night long. It doesn’t stop the snoring completely, but it is less frequent and less noisy. I’m grateful for this item and the closeness we now have waking up to each other.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It''s great for breathing
customer_reviews.text: My husband needed it because of a surgery he's having and its worked out perfect..I got mine because his was so comfortable when I tried it out..
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: A much needed relief!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my Mom before she underwent open heart surgery. We knew she would need to be elevated and would need to more easily be able to get in/out of bed, post-surgery. The bed wedge pillow arrived and was awaiting her return from the hospital. She has told everyone she knows about it! It is extremely comfortable, supportive, and is the perfect size. It's big...in a great way! This pillow has truly been a blessing for her as she continues to mend. Thank you for this great product!
customer_reviews.author: R.K.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic pillow!!!
customer_reviews.text: My grandfather loved this! He has terminal COPD and its hard to breathe for him laying down and this really helps him! My grandmothers happy that hes not snoring as bad and loved the pillow so much she bought 2 more to go across the whole bed. Now we have 3! Really helps with allergys, snoring, and the added bonus of being propt up to see the tv! Im going to buy one for my mom for mothers day! :)
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: I Like It
customer_reviews.text: I have used it for elevation and for a back rest when reading. In both cases it worked well. Only caution is that it is quite heavy and unwieldy so if someone has difficulty lifting or maneuvering heavy objects, they should consider this issue. It hasn’t been a problem for me and I am not particularly strong at all.
customer_reviews.author: MaryH

customer_reviews.title: Cushy Form Bed Wedge Pillow - 1.5 Inch Memory Foam Top (25 x 24 x 12 "
customer_reviews.text: I panicked when I opened the package when the pillow looked like a pancake! Then as it sat unwrapped it grew and turned into the product I was going for. My loved one has to be in bed more than ever and might as well be as comfortable as possible. This pillow is soft and fuzzy and has memory foam so it doesn't flatten out and get hard like conventional, usual pillows do. It's perfect for our needs. Delivered on time and in great condition after unwrapped.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Comparone

customer_reviews.title: Better than thought
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this wedge back in Jan 2020. It's now May, 2020. After several months of use I can truly say that it performs as promised. It is made of good quality material and is sturdy, yet soft and comfortable. I have several medical conditions that required me to purchase a wedge. I'm glad that I chose this one!
customer_reviews.author: Tammara

customer_reviews.title: More than I could have hoped for
customer_reviews.text: For several months I have been having trouble sleeping because during the night I would start coughing to the point I would throw up. I tried a lot of things to help. Some did but not enough. I did some research and found out that sometimes wedge pillow helps. I ordered this product and from the first night, my sleep has improved 100% or more. I no longer have the bad coughs and I also noted I slept better. Also some neck pain I had been having went away. This is the best buy I have made in a long time. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Hayes.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: My husband had some surgery last year afterward he slepted better with his head raised, whenever we visit our children he would sleep on a flat bed his back would hurt, so we decided to try the wedge. It helped! We can now go more places at least for a day or two!
customer_reviews.author: OOHNOO

customer_reviews.title: Used this to improve my snoring
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased to improve my snoring which it did do but i found that the angle was a bit too steep to be comfortable all night as i would slide down in the bed as the night wore on. Some people may not have as much of a problem with this as I did. YMMV
customer_reviews.author: Grimrivet

customer_reviews.title: Snoring be gone!
customer_reviews.text: I snore and very LOUD. After trying many pillows, ear plugs and many many rough nights for my boyfriend I bought this pillow! I haven't snored loud once and I rarely snore at all now. The down side: kind of hard, could be softer. And it comes in a pillow case cover that you cannot take off, you can unzip it but can't take it off so washing it is tricky.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: I slept much better using this wedge
customer_reviews.text: I slept much better using this wedge. Started to get a sinus infection the day I received it but was not up all night coughing & no acid reflux since, but I don't have problems every day. Dost alot more rested in the morning even getting used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Renee W

customer_reviews.title: Finally a great night sleep.
customer_reviews.text: My wife has been complaining about her back for years. She often claims she feels beat up in the mornings. She also snores something fierce and she was not sleeping well whether she knows it or not. I bought this wedge pillow for her. She no longer complains of feeling beat up and I no linger have to wake all night to her snoring. Win, win for us both.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality and function
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend bought me one of these for after I had nasal surgery and needed to sleep sitting upright. I returned the favor and bought her one for her birthday and we use them all the time. Great for reading or just sitting up a little bit while laying down.
customer_reviews.author: illiniguy

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow with good support
customer_reviews.text: The pillow is much bigger than what I expected. It's also a bit of a challenge to find a pillowcase to accommodate it. However, I find this pillow to be a great comfort to my shoulders, head and neck. I don't wake up with a headache, neck and shoulder pains. Great pillow!
customer_reviews.author: anchorofhope

customer_reviews.title: Let's patient sleep in bed.
customer_reviews.text: She has been sleeping on the couch so her head and torso are elevated. Bought one wedge pillow and allowed her to sleep in her bed, but she turned over and rolled off the wedge, so we bought a second pillow and now she doesn't get jolted. First wedge took two days to come to full size, second wedge was warmer and came to full size within hours. Completely satisfied with the wedge pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Nanrgran

customer_reviews.title: best sleep in months
customer_reviews.text: This is far superior to a pile of pillows that constantly shifts and slides. The first night I had it was the best sleep I'd had in months. It's very comfortable with a softer layer on top and is very sturdy. The company has excellent service and a quality product; they follow-up with very nice emails to see if you're satisfied or have any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Bay Area

customer_reviews.title: Like a block of concrete!
customer_reviews.text: My doc suggested a wedge to prevent further damage to my rotator cuffs which were giving me severe pain during sleep. The wedge is like a block of concrete. I don't sleep more than 45 minutes at a time. My shoulders hurt a little less during the day but at the expense of sleep. I am going to try a few more nights and hopefully find restful, non-fractured sleep. As of today, I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Ohda

customer_reviews.title: Product of high quality, very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wedge pillow for reading in bed at night; it is firm, just the right slope to keep my ailing lower back in a comfortable position. I'm able to read for an hour or more without pain, which is a change from the usual. My satisfaction level with this purchase is 5-star; however, if you're looking to this review to see if it's good for sleeping, I cannot help you there, as I'm not using this product for that reason. I'm thrilled with my Thera Health Brands foam wedge pillow, and would not hesitate to recommend it to others looking for back pain relief.
customer_reviews.author: A fan of all things Atlin Merrick

customer_reviews.title: where has this been all my life
customer_reviews.text: this product is made by Casper. now i am considerting a whole bed made of it
customer_reviews.author: Marian T.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have never written a review but I had to for this. I have Ehlers-Danlos hyper mobility syndrome. My life is very painful but too of the things I hate the most is trying to sit up in bed without pain and also lying in bed and looking at my phone with my neck causing me a lot of pain. This pillow is amazing. It doesn’t cure my symptoms (cuz duh), but it has helped minimize the issues I have hanging out in bed. Don’t hesitate to buy this even if you are using it too sit up in bed, it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Works good for reflux and snoring
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow to help with reflux and snoring, it helped a lot, worked perfectly. Soft touch and firm body it is a very good quality piece. I am 5’8 and for me is a bit tall, if I lay over it using all its length my weight overload the hips and pelvis, giving you a great discomfort during the night. So I need to use just the lowest portion and It still works great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Marcio Roberto Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t feel like a recliner.
customer_reviews.text: This is a firm wedge but that’s not what bothered me. I bought it because I found that sleeping in a recliner made my back feel better and I thought I could replicate it in bed. I tended to slide down this wedge at night and it doesn’t feel anything like a recliner. I found myself using it more like a pillow, and it’s not a good pillow. It will be nice for watching tv in bed but if you’re trying to get that recliner feeling in bed, this won’t do it.
customer_reviews.author: Lori L. Gronek

customer_reviews.title: did not hit the spot.
customer_reviews.text: I am one of those long-term back and neck and shoulder pain sufferers who has a graveyard of pillows in their home. always in search for the perfect one! I thought this would have been the answer to my woes. but there is just something about it that is not quite right. the length the width or the height the tangent I am not so sure which I think a combo of all three. eveythime i sleep on this pilloe i wake up with horrible headache neck and back pain. now i put in on my lounger sofa dfor anyone to enjoy while wathcing tv. it is a big hit there i must say with the household and guests.
customer_reviews.author: ayca Kabasakal

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cushion to take on vacation because I have an issue sleeping in hotel room beds. Just came back from 5 night stay in 2 separate hotel beds. Worked great! It comes with a washable high quality case but I wish they offered a carry case as I am going to traveling more with my wedge!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sound sleeping and less back issues
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my husband as a Christmas gift. He absolutely loves it. He’s sleeping so much better since he’s had it. He’s using it where the upper half of his body is raised. He has minor back issues but this has made a difference. He’s sleeping more soundly by not being flat on his back. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: I luv dogs

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase to Improve Overall Sleep Quality
customer_reviews.text: This bed wedge has really been a good purchase for me. I was recently diagnosed with mild to moderate sleep apnea and the wedge has really improved my sleep since using it. It has also helped with digestive issues and has helped to ease typical aches and pains as it provides good support for the upper body and neck. However, it does take some time as well for the wedge to loosen-up, typically about a week to 2 weeks, which is described in the provided instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: My husband sleeps better but still snores
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband who is a light sleeper and is picky with pillows. He says he sleeps better, which is great. It doesn’t help with the snoring, though! The removable and washable cover is a huge plus.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Well worth a try
customer_reviews.text: I have severe sciatica pain in my left leg ...did some research & found out that using this wedge might help relieve the pain (which it did) and allowed me to sleep through the night ( the pain was waking me up about every hour) IMHO it is well worth the cost. I use the wedge for the back and the wedge for elevating the legs. M.H.
customer_reviews.author: mike h.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend 200%
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! Absolutely love it. My back feels soooooooo much better since I got the pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Nelly L.

customer_reviews.title: Just what the Doctor ordered!
customer_reviews.text: I had surgery on my elbow last month and struggled to get any quality sleep during the last two weeks. Even before my surgery my sleep was restless trying to adjust the pillows to get comfortable. I researched and read the reviews on different manufacturers and to me this one stood out. It’s the first time I had a very good nights sleep In the last 30 days. It was the perfect angle and firmness to accommodate my needs. With the wedge I don’t even need a pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Slide off
customer_reviews.text: This actually worked for it's purpose which was to keep me upright (somewhat) after my Epley procedure to cure me of vertigo. However, I tended to slide down towards to foot of the bed and would wake up in the morning flat on the bed. So, it was good until I was over the vertigo and now I don't use it. But, I will keep in case the vertigo reappears later.
customer_reviews.author: grandmadeedee

customer_reviews.title: Good wedge
customer_reviews.text: I had spinal fusion at C6-7 and you have to sleep ona wedge ina neck Brace . All things considered it works ! It inflated fast and doesn’t stink . Very sturdy . I’m sure it’s great for GERD too .
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Works like you'd expect it to
customer_reviews.text: Fluffed up right away. It's pretty firm so you def. Need another softer pillow when using. Works well and after using it just one night I feel a bit more refreshed from less snoring.
customer_reviews.author: WashShopper

customer_reviews.title: Sleep Apnea relief
customer_reviews.text: My husband has sleep apnea bad! This is a life saver. However not the best for side sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: candice brown

customer_reviews.title: This pillow made me feel worse I regret buying it
customer_reviews.text: Very firm there for very uncomfortable since you're sleeping at an angle and considering the steepness of the ankle it seems like it should be 6 in longer. I did not like it at all
customer_reviews.author: Chelsi Lee Marie

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR SNORING SPOUSES!
customer_reviews.text: This product saved our marriage. Actually, it saved my husbands life because I was about to smother him for his snoring!!! Additionally, he is sleeping better and waking up with no more aches and pains! And I’m not sneaking off to the spare bedroom!
customer_reviews.author: Mathbrat

customer_reviews.title: Able to breathe better
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product because my dr recently ordered supplemental oxygen for me as it is difficult for me to breathe lying down. i am able to breathe better and therefore sleep better with the wedge. Much cheaper than buying a bed that has a head i can raise electrically !
customer_reviews.author: fisherswoman

customer_reviews.title: Has done wonders for my breathing.
customer_reviews.text: I have COPD and using just an ordinary pillow made it hard to breath, so had to stack pillows. Still use my regular pillow, The Wedge pillow allows me to sit up so I can even out my breathing and slowly go to sleep. I got the 12" and it was a little bigger than I thought, but it does work for me. I use the pillow straight up.. A great product that I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nita

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for sleeping with broken shoulder. Only problem ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for sleeping with broken shoulder. Only problem is it was advertised as 12' high but only measured 7" high when fully expanded. Eventually got a refund. Thanks, Amazon (5 stars for going to bat)!
customer_reviews.author: J. Richard T

customer_reviews.title: Firm and Functional
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is firm but I just put a squishy pillow on top of it for a comfortable nights sleep. I have seasonal allergies and using this pillow has helped me to wake up with less sinus congestion.
customer_reviews.author: MOMOFMC

customer_reviews.title: ... just had blepharoplasty and liposuction and I am SO glad that I purchased this item
customer_reviews.text: I just had blepharoplasty and liposuction and I am SO glad that I purchased this item. I use it with my regular pillow to give my neck additional support. I suffer from multiple back issues and I do not do well sleeping on my back. It's the perfect elevation and extremely comfortable. There is enough room for my arms to rest comfortably at my side. I am 5'4" and 140 pounds. I also must add that I do use this in conjunction with a knee pillow. I would recommend this product, especially for post-op.
customer_reviews.author: A Lucca

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: My sleep has always been an issue. I won't say this pillow is a cure all, but it has positively affected my sleep. It's very comfortable and aides in the elevation needed to breathe easier when laying down.
customer_reviews.author: Georgette

customer_reviews.title: Too firm
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for after my rotator cuff surgery. Unfortunately it is VERY firm and was too painful for me to sleep on more than once. I woke up with every part of my body hurting and ended up switching to numerous bed pillows squished and shoved under my upper body to get some rest.
customer_reviews.author: AmyB

customer_reviews.text: This product comfortable raises the upper half of your body, whether for achy back, acid reflux, or snoring. I was a little hesitant that it might feel odd to be propped up a few inches, but this pillow is extremely comfortable! It's plenty wide, so is almost like the top of the mattress is angled slightly up for the whole half of the bed. Overall, A+++! I won't be going back to sleeping flat after this :)
customer_reviews.author: bluelake

customer_reviews.title: Helps to prevent my recurring bronchitis
customer_reviews.text: I use this wedge to help prevent recurring bronchitis. Sleeping on the wedge keeps sinuses drained from my head and chest during the night. The elevation of this wedges works well.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Reed

customer_reviews.title: a must if you just had surgery and need to support
customer_reviews.text: I recently had leg surgery and needed something to support myself in bed. bought this in tandem with foot support wedge pillow. lots of support, but not the highest quality of foam. I considering the nature of my surgery and pain, I need to add a pillow for more comfort, or to adjust my angle at rest
customer_reviews.author: Mania B

product_meta.title: Cushy Form Bed Wedge Pillow - 1.5 Inch Memory Foam Top (25 x 24 x 12 Inches) Best for Sleeping, Reading, Rest or Elevation - Breathable and Washable Cover (12 Inch Wedge, White)
feature_bullets: ✅ TURN YOUR BED INTO A COMFORTABLE RECLINER - By improving your body posture and supporting your upper back and shoulders, this bed wedge cushion can relieve you of back and neck pain, as well as improve circulation.

✅ IMPROVE YOUR OVERALL HEALTH - This bed wedge riser promotes a better sleep position and provides relief from orthopedic health issues with your spine, neck and shoulders. Multipurpose and adjustable - enjoy the perfect angle, position the wedge upright while watching TV or reading - or you can even use it for leg elevation!

✅ HIGH DENSITY MEMORY FOAM TOP - To maximize comfort and fit your body's shape as best as possible, the bed wedge pillow features a layer of high density memory foam. The foam contours to your shoulders, neck and head, offering you a uniquely comfortable slope for a restful experience. Wedge measurements are 25 x 24 x 12 inches. The Cushy Form Wedge is firm and will not collapse under your body. We recommend using an extra pillow on top for neck and head support.

✅ BREATHABLE & WASHABLE COVER - In addition to its comfortable memory foam layer, the bed wedge pillow has a soft and breathable cover. Not only does it help it maintain a comfortable temperature, it's also easily removable and machine washable!

✅ 100% RISK FREE PURCHASE - At Cushy Form, we have absolute faith in our ergonomic shape bed wedge pillows. After all, they're what we use ourselves! If, however, your new pillow doesn't meet your expectations, don't worry! Our products are covered by a 100% money back guarantee! ✅ IDEAL GIFT for Black Friday, Cyber Monday, Prime Deal Day, Easter or Christmas

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
